info.title: Power Pulse
info.description: backend for react app Power Pulse by Zakodovani

requestBody.description: `name` - string, required.`email` - string email required.`password` - string, min 6, required.
`email` - string email required.`password` - string, min 6, required.

`height` - number; minimum 150; required .`currentWeight` - number; minimum 35; required .`desiredWeight` - number; minimum 35; required .`birthday` - date; must be older than 18 ;  required .`blood` - number; allowed values 1, 2, 3, 4; required .`sex` - string; allowed values 'male', 'female'; required .`levelActivity` - number; allowed values 1, 2, 3, 4, 5; required

200.description: calculated BMR an avatar can also be displayed if there is one

get.description: Returns a list of all products
Returns a list of all products categories
Return all exercizes matches filter of "body part", "equipment" or "target". Type in "parameters" for example "chest"

get.summary: Get list of bodyparts, muscles, equipments
get.description: Returns a list of all bodyparts, muscles, equipments

post.description: Addition you can add specific date, it's not required parameters "date": "YYYY-MM-DD "
Addition you can add specific date, it's not required parameters "date": "YYYY-MM-DD "

get.description: consumedProduct :{`_id`:the name of the product is more precisely its id in the product database,`id`:unique identifier of the product that is in the array consumedProduct} `|` exerciseDone :{`_id`:the name of the exercise is more precisely its id in the exercise database,`id`:unique identifier of the exercise that is in the array exerciseDone}
get.summary: Retrieve the diary information for a specific date

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Type a date in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

get.description: Returns a list of all counts of trainings, burned calories, registered users, spent time of all users, total users made exercises
